plays.text: Goal scored by Michal Handzus assisted by Donald Brashear and Radovan Somik
Penalty to Bryan McCabe 2 minutes for Roughing Keith Primeau
Penalty to Todd Fedoruk 2 minutes for Hooking Shayne Corson
Goal scored by Alexander Mogilny assisted by Tomas Kaberle and Robert Svehla
Penalty to Jonas Hoglund 2 minutes for Holding Michal Handzus
Goal scored by Jeremy Roenick assisted by Joe Sacco
Goal scored by Mark Recchi assisted by Pavel Brendl and Keith Primeau
Penalty to Kim Johnsson 2 minutes for Holding Tie Domi
